snippet: Readers weighed in about the New York City Marathon in the wake of Hurricane Sandy, which devastated parts of the tristate area and beyond. Here are some of their reactions.
lead_paragraph: Readers weighed in about the New York City Marathon in the wake of Hurricane Sandy, which devastated parts of the tristate area and beyond. Here are some of their reactions.

headline.seo: Letters to the Editor: Priorities in Wake of Storm
